attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we can not get our titledeeds from the developers , have to wait 5 yrs before they let us have them , at a cost !
we were advised to add to  a petition already in hand, sent in by many expats here but could not find it , if the developer go out of business , their bank could charge us with their debt, help we are just 2 old age pentioners. enjoying better health here in the sun .

rejection.details:
Dear Mrs Galer

Here is the existing petition for the title deeds in Cyprus issue. 

Can we suggest that you sign this one rather than creating a new petition. It already has over 1500 signatures which means an answer will be provided by the relevant Government department once the petition has drawn to a close.

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
